Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to authorizing the department of transportation to extend the expiration date of any franchise to operate and maintain bus stop shelters.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorizing the DOT to extend the expiration date of any franchise to operate and maintain bus shelters.

Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. C 040215 ZMK pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 35.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 040216 ZSK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 35 to facilitate the development of a community facility building.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
